h2_invite_code_rules: The "Mindtrix for Creators" platform is invitation-only. If you have passed the review, the Mindtrix team will send you an invitation code via email. If you do not receive it, please contact mindtrix.xyz@gmail.com
label_mindtrix_terms: I acknowledge my assent to the terms above.
